caster:DivertMana.NAME: Divert Mana
caster:DivertMana.DESCRIPTION: caster:Slow-down 1. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! additional Block for each spell you're casting.

caster:Intensify.NAME: Intensify
caster:Intensify.DESCRIPTION: Increase the base damage and Block of all Spells you are currently casting by !M!. Draw 1 card.

caster:RuneMagic.NAME: Rune Magic
caster:RuneMagic.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! block. NL caster:Fast-forward !M!. NL Exhaust.

caster:PhoenixFlare.NAME: Phoenix Flare
caster:PhoenixFlare.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if this is exhausted put it in your hand and it gains !M! damage. Exhaust. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:IceAge.NAME: Ice Age
caster:IceAge.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block. NL Gains !M! additional Block for each card you caster:Freeze after playing this.

caster:Gain.NAME: Gain
caster:Gain.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, caster:Electrify 1 card and draw 1 card.
caster:Gain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, caster:Electrify 1 card and draw 1 card.

caster:WallOfMirrors.NAME: Wall Of Mirrors
caster:WallOfMirrors.DESCRIPTION: Prevent and reflect all damage dealt by target enemy this turn. NL Exhaust.

caster:WallOfRocks.NAME: Wall Of Rocks
caster:WallOfRocks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This turn, the next 3 times you fully block enemy damage, that enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

caster:Bzzzt.NAME: BZZZT
caster:Bzzzt.DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !M! cards. Discard all non-electrified cards. Draw !M!. NL Exhaust.
caster:Bzzzt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !M! cards. Discard all non-electrified cards. Draw !M!.

caster:GateOfBabylon.NAME: Gate of Babylon
caster:GateOfBabylon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every caster:unique_spell in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every caster:unique_spell in your deck. NL Unique Spells: !M!

caster:Tundra.NAME: Tundra
caster:Tundra.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
caster:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, cast it again with 1 more hit.
caster:LightningBolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times. NL If this kills an enemy, cast it again with 1 more hit.

caster:PrimordialFlame.NAME: Primordial Flame
caster:PrimordialFlame.DESCRIPTION: When this exhausts, shuffle a copy in your draw pile and caster:Ignite it. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to the enemy with the highest HP, !M! times.

caster:AbsoluteZero.NAME: Absolute Zero
caster:AbsoluteZero.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Whenever caster:Freezing this card, double its base damage this combat.

caster:StaticField.NAME: Static Field
caster:StaticField.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a card from your discard pile to your hand and give it !M! caster:Electrify. NL Exhaust.
caster:StaticField.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a card from your discard pile to your hand and give it !M! caster:Electrify.

caster:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
caster:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: {@@}If this is caster:Electrified, gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage. NL Otherwise, caster:Electrify a card {!M!|@=twice.|>2=!M! times} and deal !D! damage twice.

caster:Kindling.NAME: Kindling
caster:Kindling.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! caster:Blazed. NL Draw !caster:M2! card.
caster:Kindling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! caster:Blazed. NL Draw !caster:M2! cards.

caster:Surge.NAME: Surge
caster:Surge.DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random card in your hand. NL Gain [E].
caster:Surge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random cards in your hand. NL Gain [E] [E].

caster:Congeal.NAME: Congeal
caster:Congeal.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Whenever you play a Spell this turn, ALL enemies lose !caster:M2! Strength. NL Exhaust.

caster:Permafrost.NAME: Permafrost
caster:Permafrost.DESCRIPTION: caster:Slow-down 1. NL You cannot lose HP for 1 turn. NL Exhaust.
caster:Permafrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Slow-down 1. NL You cannot lose HP for 1 turn.

caster:VoltTackle.NAME: Volt Tackle
caster:VoltTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL caster:Electrify this card !M! times.

caster:JupitelThunder.NAME: Jupitel Thunder
caster:JupitelThunder.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times. NL Hits 1 extra time for every Spell played after playing this

caster:PyroclasticTide.NAME: Pyroclastic Tide
caster:PyroclasticTide.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of ALL fire Spells by !M! this combat. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies.

caster:Ifrit.NAME: Ifrit
caster:Ifrit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a card, draw 1 extra card and gain [E] next turn.

caster:Electroplating.NAME: Electroplating
caster:Electroplating.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Electrify a card, Gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

caster:Thermodynamics.NAME: Thermodynamics
caster:Thermodynamics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Freeze a card, gain !M! Block. NL Whenever you caster:Thaw a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

caster:AlternatingCurrent.NAME: Alternating Current
caster:AlternatingCurrent.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy. NL Deals 1 extra damage each time it Echoes.

caster:FrostDriver.NAME: Frost Driver
caster:FrostDriver.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! card. NL Draw !caster:M2! card. NL Deal !D! damage.

caster:MagicResonance.NAME: Magic Resonance
caster:MagicResonance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Spell you are currently casting.

caster:Susanoo.NAME: Susano'o
caster:Susanoo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove ALL caster:Electrify from your hand, deck, and discard pile. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each stack removed.

caster:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
caster:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Reduce this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

caster:FireWall.NAME: Fire Wall
caster:FireWall.DESCRIPTION: While this is *Casting, on *Ignite: gains !M! caster:Echo, on exhaust: caster:Fast-Forward this !M!. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies.

caster:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
caster:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: caster:Thaw !M! card. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:ShivasWrath.NAME: Shiva's Wrath
caster:ShivasWrath.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Freeze an caster:Electrified card, or viceversa, become caster:Shattered.
caster:ShivasWrath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you caster:Freeze an caster:Electrified card, or viceversa, become caster:Shattered.

caster:IceShard.NAME: Ice Shard
caster:IceShard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Can target self or enemy. NL Gain !B! Block or deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

caster:LightningRod.NAME: Lightning Rod
caster:LightningRod.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! caster:Lightning_Rods. NL When you caster:Electrify, if this is in your discard pile put it on top of your deck.

caster:Illusion.NAME: Illusion
caster:Illusion.DESCRIPTION: Change an enemy intent to Block this turn. NL Exhaust.

caster:StormGust.NAME: Storm Gust
caster:StormGust.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze up to !M! cards. Reduce caster:Cast_Time by 1 for each card caster:Frozen. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies.

caster:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
caster:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply the same amount of caster:Blazed. NL Add !M! *Charred to your draw pile.
caster:Eruption.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply the same amount of caster:Blazed. NL Add !M! *Charred to your hand.

caster:LordOfVermillion.NAME: Lord Of Vermillion
caster:LordOfVermillion.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to a random enemy !M! [#F7FF00]x[] X times.

caster:Charge.NAME: Charge
caster:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Shocked into your draw pile, then draw !M! cards.

caster:Slick.NAME: Slick
caster:Slick.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Blur. NL Draw 2 cards. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

caster:WallOfSwords.NAME: Wall Of Swords
caster:WallOfSwords.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Lose up to !M! Block, gain that much Thorns. NL Exhaust.

caster:WallOfAsh.NAME: Wall Of Ash
caster:WallOfAsh.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Wall *Of *Ash into your draw and discard pile. NL Exhaust.
caster:WallOfAsh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Wall *Of *Ash+ into your draw and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

caster:Demi.NAME: Demi
caster:Demi.DESCRIPTION: Target loses !D! HP, plus !M!% of its current HP for each card in your exhaust pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Target loses !D! HP, plus !M!% of its current HP for each card in your exhaust pile. (!caster:M2!HP)

caster:Enfeeble.NAME: Enfeeble
caster:Enfeeble.DESCRIPTION: Apply !caster:M2! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.
caster:Enfeeble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !caster:M2! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

caster:GlacialShield.NAME: Glacial Shield
caster:GlacialShield.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! random card in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block.
caster:GlacialShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze !M! card in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block.

caster:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
caster:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, apply !M! caster:Blazed to ALL enemies. NL caster:Blazed cannot decrease on enemies.

caster:Embers.NAME: Embers
caster:Embers.DESCRIPTION: When this is caster:frozen, caster:thaw it. NL caster:Thaw up to !M! cards.
caster:Embers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When this is caster:frozen, caster:thaw it. NL caster:Thaw up to !M! cards. NL Draw 1 card.

caster:Shy.NAME: Shy
caster:Shy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain !B! Block, caster:Thaw !M! card and discard this.
caster:Shy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain !B! Block, caster:Thaw !M! cards, draw !caster:M2! card and discard this.

caster:BurnItDown.NAME: Burn It Down
caster:BurnItDown.DESCRIPTION: {@@}caster:Ignite a card{!M!|>1= !M! times}. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

caster:Cryogenesis.NAME: Cryogenesis
caster:Cryogenesis.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze ALL cards in your hand. NL Draw !M! card for each card caster:Frozen this way. NL Exhaust.
caster:Cryogenesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze ALL cards in your hand. NL Draw !M! cards for each card caster:Frozen this way. NL Exhaust.

caster:IzanagisObdurance.NAME: Izanagi's Obdurance
caster:IzanagisObdurance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, caster:Ignite !M! card.
caster:IzanagisObdurance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, caster:Ignite !M! card. NL caster:Ignite !caster:M2! cards.

caster:EchoingVoice.NAME: Echoing Voice
caster:EchoingVoice.DESCRIPTION: Your spells have an additional 1 caster:Echo

caster:SunGoddessAmaterasu.NAME: Sun Goddess Amaterasu
caster:SunGoddessAmaterasu.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, return 1 caster:Ignited Spell or Attack from your exhaust pile to hand and caster:Ignite it.

caster:WallOfThorns.NAME: Wall Of Thorns
caster:WallOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !caster:B! Block and !M! Thorns.

caster:Cool.NAME: Chill
caster:Cool.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze 1 card. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Cast *Frostbite.
caster:Cool.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freeze 1 card. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Cast *Frostbite+.

caster:Frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
caster:Frostbite.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage to ALL enemies for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Cast *Fimbulvetr
caster:Frostbite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage to ALL enemies for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Cast *Fimbulvetr+.

caster:Fimbulvetr.NAME: Fimbulvetr
caster:Fimbulvetr.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:M2! damage to ALL enemies for each card Frozen this combat, currently: !caster:D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

caster:Superconduct.NAME: Superconduct
caster:Superconduct.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Add X *Jolt to your hand. NL Exhaust.
caster:Superconduct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Add X+!M! *Jolt+ to NL your hand. NL Exhaust.

caster:Jolt.NAME: Jolt
caster:Jolt.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL While in your *Casting *Queue, this gains 1 caster:Echo whenever you caster:Electrify NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage.

caster:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
caster:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: caster:Freezes when drawn. If this is caster:Frozen in your hand, lose !M! less block at start of turn. NL Gain !B! Block. Exhaust.
caster:IceWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Freezes when drawn. If this is caster:Frozen in your hand, lose !M! less block at start of turn. NL Gain !B! Block.

caster:PackedIce.NAME: Packed Ice
caster:PackedIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be played while caster:Frozen. NL Costs 0 while caster:Frozen.

caster:Lemonade.NAME: Lemonade
caster:Lemonade.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card and gain !B! Block for each caster:Frozen card in hand.

caster:Direct.NAME: Direct
caster:Direct.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Fetch up to !M! caster:Electrified card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw or discard pile.

caster:Mirage.NAME: Mirage
caster:Mirage.DESCRIPTION: caster:Ignite a card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When you play this: return it to your hand with Retain, it deals !M! less damage this turn.

caster:Shocked.NAME: Shocked
caster:Shocked.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this is drawn, caster:Electrify all cards in your hand. NL Ethereal.

caster:BurnOut.NAME: Burn Out
caster:BurnOut.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's caster:Blazed, next time caster:Blazed is triggered the enemy loses all caster:Blazed stacks. NL Exhaust.
caster:BurnOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's caster:Blazed, next time caster:Blazed is triggered the enemy loses all caster:Blazed stacks.

caster:Charred.NAME: Charred
caster:Charred.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL caster:Ignite all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

caster:SuperCool.NAME: Super Cool
caster:SuperCool.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL All cards in your hand gain: caster:Freeze this card the next time it's played.

caster:FrostSeed.NAME: Frost Seed
caster:FrostSeed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Permanently increase this card's Block by !M! whenever you caster:Freeze it. NL Exhaust.

caster:Avalanche.NAME: Avalanche
caster:Avalanche.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to All enemies. NL Shuffle !M! *Snowed into your draw pile.

caster:Snowed.NAME: Snowed
caster:Snowed.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When drawn caster:Freeze !M! random card.

caster:Igloo.NAME: Igloo
caster:Igloo.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

caster:MatchBox.NAME: Match Box
caster:MatchBox.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL caster:Ignite an attack or spell !M! times. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

caster:WallOfLightning.NAME: Wall Of Lightning
caster:WallOfLightning.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Costs 1 less energy for each time you caster:Electrified a card this combat.

caster:BurningSpirit.NAME: Burning Spirit
caster:BurningSpirit.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, caster:thaw !M! card, if you do, gain [E]
caster:BurningSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, caster:thaw !M! card, if you do, gain [E]

caster:AetherflameCatalyst.NAME: Aetherflame Catalyst
caster:AetherflameCatalyst.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Electrify an caster:Ignited card, or viceversa, enter caster:Electroplasma.
caster:AetherflameCatalyst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you caster:Electrify an caster:Ignited card, or viceversa, enter caster:Electroplasma.

caster:TransmuteSoul.NAME: Transmute Soul
caster:TransmuteSoul.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Purge NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to the Highest HP enemy. If Fatal, gain 1 extra [E] permanently and remove this from your deck.

caster:CurtainCall.NAME: Curtain Call
caster:CurtainCall.DESCRIPTION: Your *Spells with caster:Echo can no longer Echo, instead they deal twice the damage.
caster:CurtainCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Your *Spells with caster:Echo can no longer Echo, instead they deal twice the damage.
